item.title: Resources for Dynamics GP and SharePoint
item.description:
Clients are frequently asking about SharePoint, often in conversations about Business Portal and how to share Dynamics GP data with a wider, non-Dynamics GP user group. To help with these discussions, I’m sharing some resources I often use. Please feel free to share yours, and I’ll update the blog accordingly. To clarify the differences between Windows SharePoint Services (WSS) and Microsoft Office SharePoint Server (MOSS), and other editions, refer to the SharePoint Edition Comparison: http://office...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/resources-for-dynamics-gp-and-sharepoint/

item.title: Eating facai may have negative health effects
item.description:
A vegetarian dish commonly enjoyed during Chinese New Year often features “facai” fungus, which resembles hair and symbolizes prosperity due to its name sounding like “gaining prosperity” in Chinese. However, facai, scientifically known as nostoc flagelliforme, is a type of toxic bacteria. Excessive harvesting led to a ban on facai in China, resulting in most facai today being primarily made from starch. A 2009 study published in Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis revealed that authentic nostoc flagelliforme was rare in commercially available facai, and those genuine samples contained a toxin called beta-N-methylamino-L-alanine (BMAA)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/eating-facai-may-have-negative-health-effects/
